import React from 'react'; import "./PokemonInfo.css" const pokemons = require("../../constants/data.json"); const PokemonInfo = ({ currentPkmnId }) => { const pokemon = pokemons[currentPkmnId - 1]; return (

{pokemon.name}

Type

Weakness

{pokemon.type.map((type) => { return ( ) })}
{pokemon.weaknesses.filter((e, i) => i < 2).map((weakness) => { return ( ) })}

weight

{pokemon.weight}

candy

{pokemon.candy}

) } export default PokemonInfo;
